data.title: Was the Villain in Pearl White's'Perils of Pauline' In "The Perils of Pauline" His First Role a Failure A Native of Sweden Film Debut With Theda Bara Charlie Chan Carried On Some of His Pictures
data.text:
WARNER OLAND, 57, SCREEN STAR, DIES; 'Charlie Chan' of Films Victim of Pneumonia on Visit to Sweden, His Homeland BEGAN CAREER ON STAGE Film Debut With Theda Bara--Was the Villain in Pearl White's'Perils of Pauline' In "The Perils of Pauline" His First Role a Failure A Native of Sweden Film Debut With Theda Bara Charlie Chan Carried On Some of His Pictures

Aug. 7, 1938

Warner Oland, famous as an actor in Hollywood Oriental roles, died today at 3 P. M. (9 A. M., E. S. T.), at the age of 57. Death came at a Stockholm hospital where he had been ill of pneumonia. View Full Article in Timesmachine Â»
